title: Is there a way for the boards to be implemented to the client?
body: Would be real nice to see a lot more people discuss stuff ya know.

replies.body:
If the community wanted to discuss stuff, they'd just log on here. Maybe use this discord. But they're not all really looking for discussion, more than they're looking to play the game.

There's us, the majority of people that like to play the game, but also log on here and create/talk about stuff like the totally-not-nerds we are. :P

There's the people who only really pop on here when they're unable to play the game (e.g. at work) and are really only here to pass the time or try and see what's going on while they're offline.

Or there's the most detrimental group we all know and hate: those who just got absolutely wrecked (and/or banned) and literally have nothing better to do but "ReEeEeEeE" all over the forums about the "injustice" of their demise.

All the people who are really interested in being here are already here...I feel like your idea will not only make our already buggy client run even slower/drop the ball more, but would really only succeed in reminding people in that third group that there's a place they can come and pointlessly blow up with their complaining.
Yeah ofcourse, it'd be pretty cool to be able to see the latest posts etc on a side panel in the league client.

Yes, a browser could be embedded.

No, there is no reason to do it - it would be more broken and less easy to use than just opening user's choice of browser.
